title: Playing Garen for the first time, it's really funny how nobody has any expectations of him
body:
Everyone just lets Garen do as he pleases.

 Hilarious compared to playing something like Janna where everyone's always barking orders/ playing the blame game.

replies.body: What can Garen do. He cant peel, he cant stop anyone from getting to the back line, and the only thing he can do is just whatever he wants.

> [{quoted}](name=LeftyRaydy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gIFiLdFx,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-06-22T15:35:29.476+0000)
>
> What can Garen do. He cant peel, he cant stop anyone from getting to the back line, and the only thing he can do is just whatever he wants.

Well did you know that the easiest type of peel is to kill the enemy team before they can kill your back line. You can use your silence to stop any ability reliant champs to use their spells to kill your back line. And even better if the assassin is the villain you can ult them after q to basically 2 shot them.
Garen and Mundo are bros now. yay. Never thought that fugly champ would get a friend.
idk I was playing some Predator Lethality Garen a while ago and a few teams got mad at me for it.
